extendedInfo.description: The ultimate Trivia App for the ultimate Twilight fan! With 110+ questions we more then double the questions that other apps offer! Not to mention our numerous features that most don't consider! Test your skills against the world in New Moon The Novel Trivia! Filled with 5 banks of trivia containing over 110 questions!

reviews.comment: Very fun game. U have to choose the correct answer out of 4 choices b/f time runs out. Then u get a briefing on the correct answer choice. Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It was a good idea but definately not worth $3. Progress doesnt save. For $3 i would expect pictures or alot more. Disappointing. App should be free.
reviews.author: A Google User
